clean_data: Lead Developer Lead span lDeveloperspan Senior Drupal Developer Marietta GA Heinz is a seasoned web professional with experience dating back to 1999 Since 2007 he has specialized in the Drupal content management framework Proficient in both frontend and backend development his expertise is in PHP MySQL jQuery Javascript HTML5 and CSS3 Heinz excels at creating custom Drupal modules that implement new custom functionality or tie into obscure APIs He also enjoys incorporating unique designs into custom Drupal themes He enthusiastically welcomes any Drupal challenge In 1994 Heinz graduated Summa Cum Laude from the Georgia Institute of Technology with a Bachelors in Electrical Engineering In 1998 fueled by a passion for web technologies he began the pursuit of a new career in the web development industry In 2005 Heinz cofounded the graphic design and web development firm Simplex Creative Group In 2007 he became the first employee of a now established Drupal development firm Mediacurrent In 2010 Heinz founded the web development firm Element 31 Web Solutions where he is currently developing and managing fully customized Drupalbased websites and applications Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Lead Developer StoreFrontier LLC Woodstock GA January 2015 to Present Lead developer and project lead on storefrontiercom a highly customized site utilizing the Drupal content management framework Founder and Lead Developer Element 31 LLC Marietta GA April 2010 to Present Developer of many highly customized Drupal websites for companies in a wide range of fields Senior Web Developer Mediacurrent Alpharetta GA September 2007 to April 2010 Drupal specialist and first employee for this now wellestablished Drupal development firm Education Certificate in Web Development Kennesaw State University Kennesaw GA June 2001 to January 2002 Bachelors in Electrical Engineering Georgia Institute of TechnologyMain Campus Atlanta GA September 1990 to June 1994 Skills Drupal PHP MySQL JQuery HTML 5 CSS3 Photoshop Illustrator Javascript
